name: Jet Buster
description: Jet Buster is the new 90s anthro shmup, going back to the cuter roots of the genre.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista and higher Processor: 1,8 Ghz Single Core Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Pixel and Vertex Shader 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: May not run correctly with Intel HD integrated graphics units.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista and higher Processor: 2 Ghz Single Core Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Pixel and Vertex Shader 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: May not run correctly with Intel HD integrated graphics units.
